text:
Hi everyone!
There are some general questions.
I’m developing a new website theme for placing on this marketplace, but I’m worried a bit because there are not so many paid assets there. What is the reason for this?
I study all the technical and design requirements, but should I worry about something else? Do I need a Paypal merchant account to get payments, and so on?
I have created many themes for Envato Marketplace, but I’d like to get a new experience here. Hopefully, this is just a new market, and I’d like to grow with it.
Thanks
<@U03P8JH3XA4> to my knowledge the images shown in the demo pages have to be included in the theme. I believe you can read about this in the submission requirements.
